LanguageData.OE_SynthesisPrinter.label: obsidia synthesis printer
LanguageData.OE_SynthesisPrinter.description: A high-tech obsidia printer used for synthesis.
LanguageData.OE_ArmorStation.label: obsidia armor station
LanguageData.OE_ArmorStation.description: An electric-powered station equipped with advanced tools for assembling obsidia armor.
LanguageData.OE_WeaponWorkbench.label: obsidia weapon workbench
LanguageData.OE_WeaponWorkbench.description: An electric-powered workbench equipped with advanced tools for assembling obsidia weapon.
LanguageData.OE_PersonaTable.label: obsidia armament table
LanguageData.OE_PersonaTable.description: A high-tech workstation equipped with precision instruments, neural link interfaces, and advanced tools used to bond both Persona and Paragon-class weaponry.
LanguageData.OE_BionicTable.label: obsidia bionic table
LanguageData.OE_BionicTable.description: A high-tech table with computers and advanced electronic tools equipment assembling obsidia bionic.
LanguageData.OE_AmalgamVat.label: obsidia amalgam vat
LanguageData.OE_AmalgamVat.description: A high-tech computer connected to a vat of fluid which can gestate an amalgam.
